title: It Starts With Us
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A contemporary romance novel and sequel to “It Ends with Us.” The story picks up where the previous book ended — following the main characters **Lily** and **Atlas** as they navigate second chances, co‑parenting, past heartbreak, and renewed love. Told in alternating first‑person perspectives, it explores themes of love, healing, family, and starting over. The paperback edition runs about 336 pages, published by Atria Books. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
